sentences.sContent: This achievement provides the microfossil materials for the study of the lower ordovician in Northern Guizhou.
sentences.sContent_eng: This achievement provides the microfossil materials for the study of the lower ordovician in Northern Guizhou.
sentences.sCn: 这一成果对于贵州北部下奥陶统的研究，提供了微体化石资料。

trans.tranOther: a fossil generally less than 0.5 millimetre in size, such as a protozoan, bacterium, or pollen grain
